17 Dec 2007
Improved measurement of time-dependent CP violation in B 0 → J/ψ π 0 decays

We report improved measurements of time-dependent CP violation parameters for B 0 (B
0 ) →
J/ψ π 0 decay. This analysis is based on 535 million BB pairs accumulated at the Υ(4S) resonance
with the Belle detector at the KEKB asymmetric-energy e + e − collider. From the distribution of
proper time intervals between the two B decays, we obtain the following CP violation parameters
S J/ψ π 0 = −0.65 ± 0.21(stat) ± 0.05(syst) and
A J/ψ π 0 = +0.08 ± 0.16(stat) ± 0.05(syst),
which are consistent with Standard Model expectations.
PACS numbers: 12.15.Hh, 13.25.Hw
